title: Spyro Reignited Trilogy
body:
Spyro Reignited Trilogy


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Jump and run, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Toys for Bob, Activision
Languages: ENG/MULTI14
Original Size: 38 GB
Repack Size: from 20.1 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 2 (Uploaded by Uria Urikra and hermietkreeft, compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Spyro_Reignited_Trilogy-HOODLUM ISO release: hlm-spyr.iso (40,791,822,336 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (ONLY when installed with ALL language packs and credits)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of credits video and languages you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 38 to 20.1~22.6 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~20 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~40 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 39 GB
  • Language can be changed by editing “Engine\Binaries\ThirdParty\Steamworks\Steamv142\Win64\hlm.ini”
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

The original roast master is back! Same sick burns, same smoldering attitude, now all scaled up in stunning HD. Spyro is bringing the heat like never before in the Spyro™ Reignited Trilogy game collection. Rekindle the fire with the original three games, Spyro™ the Dragon, Spyro™ 2: Ripto’s Rage! and Spyro™: Year of the Dragon. Explore the expansive realms, re-encounter the fiery personalities and relive the adventure in fully remastered glory. Because when there’s a realm that needs saving, there’s only one dragon to call.

You can skip downloading of credits video and language packs you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • fg-selective-arabic.bin
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-danish.bin
  • fg-selective-dutch.bin
  • fg-selective-english.bin
  • fg-selective-finnish.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-mexican.bin
  • fg-selective-norwegian.bin
  • fg-selective-polish.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin
  • fg-selective-swedish.bin
  • fg-optional-credits.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with Spanish UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers and don’t need credits video – skip all “selective/optional” files, but download fg-selective-spanish.bin & all main files (01-06).
